The boat trip itself was very pleasant and goes a far way down the river then doubles back, it was also easy to find and get to, there was lots of seating available as most people went on the roof (it was a dry day). Instead I was only able to hear the full commentary using my own headphones which I plugged into the system, and even then I missed some bits of it as the audio cut-out now and then. Its a nice thing to do to get off the streets and learn some of the history but the kit needs fixing to make the experience work properly.
